content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1710931764588{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”440″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]Quality Group (I) is a leading indigenous contributor in Biomass Supply Chain Management and a producer of Biomass pellets/Briquettes. Our endeavor is to conserve the environment by reducing pollution and carbon footprint. The group has served the farmers and industry with amicable Bioenergy and Biomass solutions through acceptable business models; while enabling the farmers to gain entrepreneurial acumen.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]With its vast network for Biomass aggregation and professional yard management program, the group has undisputable track record as a dependable and committed supplier to marquee corporate customers.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]The bioenergy business derives its strength from organized supply chain management of biomass, state of the art quality testing procedures and production facility, with committed supplies.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]The pellet/Briquette plant is situated in Hisar district, Haryana. It has 4 complete Automatic pellets cum briquette production lines with rated production capacity of 120 MT/day. The size range for Pellets/Briquette starts from 16 mm and goes upto 90 mm. Briquettes/pellets can be separately produced from Mustard husk, Groundnut shell, Parali, Sawdust and other available Biomass. The average GCV ranges between 3500 – 4000 Kcal/kg with 5 – 10 % moisture and 8 – 10% Ash content in the final pellet/briquette.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]At Quality group, we are committed to the UN’s sustainable development goals and adding positive impact on the environment and communities.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]We look forward to catering to your valuable Biomass pellets/Briquettes requirements for the boilers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1712217356808{padding-top: 80px !important;}” el_class=”hide”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][qode_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][qode_elements_holder_item vertical_alignment=”middle” horizontal_alignment=”center” advanced_animations=”no” item_padding=”0 15px”]

Bio Mass Raw Material Annual Sourcing

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/qode_elements_holder_item][/qode_elements_holder][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][qode_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][qode_elements_holder_item vertical_alignment=”middle” horizontal_alignment=”center” advanced_animations=”no” item_padding=”0 15px”]

Annual Storage Capacity at our Factory Premise

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/qode_elements_holder_item][/qode_elements_holder][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-3 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″][qode_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][qode_elements_holder_item vertical_alignment=”middle” horizontal_alignment=”center” advanced_animations=”no” item_padding=”0 15px”]

Raw Material Testing and Quality Checking

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/qode_elements_holder_item][/qode_elements_holder][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][qode_elements_holder number_of_columns=”one_column”][qode_elements_holder_item vertical_alignment=”middle” horizontal_alignment=”center” advanced_animations=”no” item_padding=”0 15px”]

Dedicated Fleet Logistics Delivery Across India

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/qode_elements_holder_item][/qode_elements_holder][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=”” css=”.vc_custom_1712217553904{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Quality Group

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

  • Quality Group (India) is a multilocational – multiproduct organization having its manufacturing base in Stainless Steel coils, Pipes, flexible hoses and renewable energy. The flagship company Quality Foils (India) Ltd. is a publicly listed entity having manufacturing presence in stainless steel coils for over 40 years in Hisar, Haryana, India.
  • The group has forayed its presence in Renewable energy being a leading indigenous contributor in Biomass supply chain management and a producer of biomass pellets/briquettes.
  • With its vast network of biomass aggregation and professional yard management program, the group has undisputable track record as dependable and committed supplier to marquee corporate customers.
  • The Bioenergy manufacturing business derives its strengths from organized supply chain management of biomass, state of the art quality testing procedures and production facility with committed supplies.
  • At Quality Group, we are committed to the UN SDG’s and adding positive impact on the environment and communities

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”460″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
